Key Match Events: Kylian Mbappé scored a penalty to give France the lead.
Robert Lewandowski equalized from the spot for Poland.
Poland’s reserve goalkeeper Lukasz Skorupski kept out Mbappé's initial penalty attempt.
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps's team found themselves in the same half of the draw as Germany, Portugal and Spain.
France will face the runners-up of Group E – possibly Belgium – in Düsseldorf next Monday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kylian Mbappé cut a contrasting figure at the end of the match, fidgeting with his mask in sticky heat.
Robert Lewandowski stayed cool to repeat the same staggered run-up and squeeze his shot into the same corner, clinking his penalty off a post.
